content: DO BLOOD TEST BEFORE CYCLE(IF POSSIBLE) Regular blood work is STRONGLY encouraged. It is recommend getting blood work before starting your cycle (to assess your baseline Testosterone levels and general health), during your cycle (to confirm that your Testosterone is legitimate and properly dosed), and after your cycle (to assess how well you have recovered). The standard recommendation for Test E/C injections is to get bloodwork drawn 36-48 hours after your last injection CBC , Testosterone , Lipid profile , Liver Function , Kidney Function , Thyroid are some of important blood tests to be done.
